EmailTemplate.name: ICT-Email to Case
EmailTemplate.subject: TE Connectivity LADD: Case Created : {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting us.
Your case number is Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}. We will respond to you shortly.
Thank you, TE Connectivity LADD
NOTE: Please do not delete the following Thread Id: {!Case.Thread_Id}
